special_text:
Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.
[+1]: Conjure a card named Skull Fracture into your hand. [i](It's a sorcery that costs {B} with “Target player discards a card” and Flashback {3}{B}.)[/i]
[-2]: Conjure a card named Chainer's Edict into your hand. [i](It's a sorcery that costs {1}{B} with “Target player sacrifices a creature” and Flashback {5}{B}{B}.)[/i]
